net.sf.mmm.persistence.impl.jpa

Class PersistenceManagerImplJpa

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.AbstractPersistenceManager
          • net.sf.mmm.persistence.base.AbstractRevisionedPersistenceManager
            • net.sf.mmm.persistence.impl.jpa.PersistenceManagerImplJpa
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PersistenceManager, RevisionedPersistenceManager

    @Named
public class PersistenceManagerImplJpa
extends AbstractRevisionedPersistenceManager
    This is the default implementation of the PersistenceManager interface.
    ATTENTION:
    This class assumes that you have at least one custom implementation of GenericDao that gets injected to setManagers(List).
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • doInitialize

        protected void doInitialize()
        This method performs the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().
        Overrides:
        doInitialize in class AbstractLoggableComponent

      • getEntityManager

        protected javax.persistence.EntityManager getEntityManager()
        This method gets a thread-safe EntityManager. It acts as proxy to an EntityManager associated with the current thread (created when the transaction is opened e.g. via TransactionExecutor).
        Returns:
        the according EntityManager.

      • setEntityManager

        public void setEntityManager(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
        This method injects a thread-safe EntityManager instance that acts as proxy to an EntityManager associated with the current thread (created when the transaction is opened).
        Parameters:
        entityManager - is the entityManager to set

      • getPojoFactory

        protected PojoFactory getPojoFactory()
        Returns:
        the PojoFactory.

      • setPojoFactory

        @Inject
public void setPojoFactory(PojoFactory pojoFactory)
        Parameters:
        pojoFactory - is the PojoFactory to set.

      • setManagers

        @Inject
public void setManagers(List<GenericDao<?,?>> managerList)
                          throws DuplicateObjectException
        This method injects the entity-managers.
        Parameters:
        managerList - is the List of all GenericDao to register.
        Throws:
        DuplicateObjectException - if two managers use the same entity-class ( GenericDao.getEntityClass(), GenericDao#getEntityClassReadWrite(), or GenericDao#getEntityClassReadOnly()).
